column5: We have lived in this neighborhood for 4 years and love the location. I'm an Engineer and my partner is in the Restaurant Industry. I speak Spanish and French. Our home is close to restaurants and shopping. We are friendly, laid back and enjoy wine with friends. We love to meet new people. Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
column8: Private Bedroom/Bathroom in Non Smoking Household
